dmca.title: [AB-C64046K] DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 2:08:07 p.m. (GMT-6) on July 7, 2006. Legal Response Team The Planet -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Wednesday, July 05, 2006 4:38 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [AB-C64046K] DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement Subject: [AB-C64046K] DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement Reference: [AB-C64046K] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement Added by system at Tuesday, Jul 4 2006 09:53 pm X-MailFrom: nichenet@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.180] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Tue Jul 4 21:53:22 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 04 Jul 2006 21:53:21 -0500 Received: from mail.inside.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.110] helo=mail.theplanet.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from nichenet@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FxxVx-000H1X-Rx for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Tue, 04 Jul 2006 21:53:21 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from nichenet@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FxxVx-0007F4-0K for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 04 Jul 2006 21:53:21 -0500 Received: from nz-out-0102.google.com ([64.233.162.204]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from nichenet@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1FxxVw-000H11-65 for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 04 Jul 2006 21:53:20 -0500 Received: by nz-out-0102.google.com with SMTP id x3so724769nzd for ; Tue, 04 Jul 2006 19:53:17 -0700 (PDT) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=beta; d=gmail.com; h=received:message-id:date:from:user-agent:mime-version:to:cc:subject:co ntent-type:content-transfer-encoding; b=H5Lqx2bXmz/rZoz7Q/r5hdtOL4eWXkjZ34llUdWGgXTSp6ks+pa1aVPAMHnkqFkLNjdaCa OO2+vadUsAXux2XiqIWZPQMXFfkVwvmC5cVdyDBRLg3KSl5YO2gLYMiUZhdExzCSL9mCQmIm H4lz8foxS6Hee2pP7gFHUKdsS27Gw= Received: by 10.36.74.19 with SMTP id w19mr5628834nza; Tue, 04 Jul 2006 19:53:16 -0700 (PDT) Received: from ?192.168.2.3? ( [124.178.62.51]) by mx.gmail.com with ESMTP id m2sm3439569nzf.2006.07.04.19.53.13; Tue, 04 Jul 2006 19:53:16 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <44AB2988.3090105@gmail.com> Date: Wed, 05 Jul 2006 10:52:56 +0800 From: Duncan Riley User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.4 (Windows/20060516) MIME-Version: 1.0 To: abuse@theplanet.com CC: Hsien-Hsien Lei , Christina Jones Subject: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.162.204 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.162.204; envelope-from=nichenet@gmail.com; helo=nz-out-0102.google.com; MIME element (text/html) July 4, 2006

DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
re: [http://www.globalcloning.com/
Dear The Planet

I, Duncan Riley, Vice President, Operations, b5media LLC, certify under penalty of perjury, that I am the owner of certain intellectual property rights.

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. I hereby demand that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

My contact information is as follows:

Duncan Riley
b5media.com
nichenet@gmail.com
(347) 427-9299
PO Box 1334
CALAIS ME 04619


Allegedly Infringing items or materials:

http://www.globalcloning.com/
http://globalcloning.co m/?m=200607
http://gl obalcloning.com/?m=200606


and all posts linking to or referring to Genetics and Health (http://www.geneticsandhealth.com) or quoting Dr  Hsien-Hsien Lei from these pages

Infringing material that I demand be disabled or removed in consideration of the above:

http://www.globalcloning.com/
http://globalcloning.co m/?m=200607
http://gl obalcloning.com/?m=200606

and all posts linked from these pages that copy work from Genetics and Health (http://www.geneticsandhealth.com) or quoting Dr  Hsien-Hsien Lei

http://www.geneticsandheal th.com/2006/07/

Duncan Riley
